welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Melle, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere of this historic city, known for its beautiful architecture and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Melle has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
